videos.description: UCLA's Cody Riley finds Chris Smith going to the basket for the jam.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Smith throws down the two-handed slam for UCLA) 2020/11/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Smith throws down the two-handed slam for UCLA

videos.description: Pepperdine guard Darryl Polk Jr. rises up for a clutch offensive rebound and passes to Jade' Smith, who ties the game in the final minute with a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (5-foot-9 Polk crashes glass to set up Pepperdine's game-tying 3) 2020/11/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: 5-foot-9 Polk crashes glass to set up Pepperdine's game-tying 3

videos.description: Pepperdine guard Colbey Ross hits a tough shot to tie the game, and then UCLA's Jules Bernard airballs his potential game-winner to send the game to double overtime.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (UCLA, Pepperdine head to 2OT after wild sequence) 2020/11/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: UCLA, Pepperdine head to 2OT after wild sequence

videos.description: In a back-and-forth game with big shots from both teams, No. 22 UCLA pulls away in triple overtime to beat Pepperdine 107-98.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (UCLA survives scare from Pepperdine in 3OT) 2020/11/27 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: UCLA survives scare from Pepperdine in 3OT
